contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of April, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the case REMANDED to the Superior Court to follow the standard of review set forth in Commonwealth v. Ratsamy, 594 Pa. 176, 934 A.2d 1233 (Pa.2007).
Jurisdiction relinquished.
